children: WhatsAPI comes with a monitor dashboard to allow you to visually see your instances, monitor their states and take some actions. To access the dashboard just hit

content.name: p
children: For now you can Restart and Terminate your instance. If you need to see the Instance Secret you can click the Info button.

content.name: p
children: The admin dashboard is a work in progress and we intend to provide more features in the future. If you have any suggestions please send to us on our
